attributes.additional_details:
Simon Hall has spent over 9 years in prison for a crime he knew nothing about.
The case against Simon was based on circumstantial fibre evidence.
Blood, fingerprints, footprints, hair & other trace evidence found at the crime scene did not match Simon's!
In January 2011 the Court of Appeal upheld Simon's conviction even though it was shown the fibres were never a match!
An innocent man has had his life destroyed all for the sake of the integrity of the judicial system!
We want this case re-opened in order for the real killers to be thoroughly investigated and brought to justice and to allow Justice & Freedom for Simon!
http://justice4simonhall.webs.com/
